ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): recebimentoPai = widget.Entity if recebimentoPai == None: return
widget.View.Commands["EDIT"].Visible = recebimentoPai.PodeAlterar widget.View.Commands["DELETE"].Visible = recebimentoPai.PodeExcluir
statusOk = 3 widget.View.Commands["CMD_RECEBIMENTO_FISCAL"].Visible = (recebimentoPai.Status.Index == statusOk) and recebimentoPai.PodeVerComandoRecebimentoFiscal()
